titles.title: SALAMANDER Act
SALAMANDER Act
Streamlining Authorizations for Listed At-risk Marine and Aquatic Natural Disaster Emergency Resources Act

To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to establish expedited permitting procedures for post-natural disaster recovery activities, incorporating interagency coordination and best management practices to ensure timely rebuilding while protecting endangered species, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.
